lead_paragraph: LaMarcus Aldridge scored 27 points and the San Antonio Spurs won without leading scorer Kawhi Leonard, beating the Phoenix Suns 119-98 on Wednesday night.

headline.print_headline: Aldridge's 27 Help Spurs Beat Suns in Leonard's Absence
headline.main: Aldridge's 27 Help Spurs Beat Suns in Leonard's Absence

snippet: LaMarcus Aldridge scored 27 points and the San Antonio Spurs won without leading scorer Kawhi Leonard, beating the Phoenix Suns 119-98 on Wednesday night....
